Shibboleth Identity Provider 2.1.3 Java API.

The Shibboleth Identity Provider is a multi-protocol identity provider.

edu.internet2.middleware.shibboleth.idp.util  

 

The Shibboleth Identity Provider is a multi-protocol identity provider. That is, it is a system that retrieves identity information about users, prepares it in a particular protocol-defined package, and asserts this information to service providers in a trustworthy manner.
